articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Rinku's 3-word apology as brutal 6 causes damage to St George's Stadium - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rinku Singh cracked open the media box glass during the rain-curtailed encounter between India and South Africa. | Cricket
articles.content: Demolishing the South African bowling attack in the 2nd T20I of the three-match series on Tuesday, power-hitter Rinku Singh played another stellar knock to strengthen his selection case for the ICC W… [+2207 chars]
